sourcesContent:
<Box
  sx={{
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: { xs: "column", md: "row" },
    width: "100vw",
    minHeight: { xs: 600, md: "80vh" }, // shared vertical length
    boxSizing: "border-box",
    alignItems: "stretch",
    justifyContent: "center",
    gap: 2,
    p: { xs: 1, md: 3 },
  }}
>
  <CurrentWeatherContainer weather={data} />
  <WeatherMap lat={data.coord.lat} lon={data.coord.lon} city={data.name} temp={data.main.temp} />
</Box>
